message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking for the best possible price, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $137?  This offer stands as a testament to my willingness to make this work for both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose $132 for the product.
